definition: Daoist School of the Warring States Period (475-221 BC), based on the teachings of Laozi or Lao-tze 老子[Lao3 zi3] (c. 500 BC-) and Zhuangzi 庄子 (369-286 BC)

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: The potential view of education of Taoism is loaded with Chinese education tradition.
sentences.chinese: 潜隐的道家教育思想，也负载着中国教育的一脉传统。

sentences.english: Taoists maintain a negative and helpless attitude toward man's fate.
sentences.chinese: 道家对人之命运持一种自然的无可奈何的态度。

sentences.english: These two themes can respectively represent Confucian and Taoist ideal of life.
sentences.chinese: 这两个主题可以分别代表儒家和道家的生活理想。

sentences.english: There is a concept in Taoism called ‘Wu Wei.’
sentences.chinese: 在道家学说里有种理念叫做无为。

sentences.english: Li Bai, the superstar of poetry circles in Tang Dynasty, is deeply impressed by Taoism.
sentences.chinese: 唐代诗坛巨星李白，受道家思想影响甚深。

sentences.english: That coheres with philosophy of Daoism and Chan Buddhism.
sentences.chinese: 这恰恰回到了道家的哲学和禅学境界里来了。

sentences.english: Judging from Taoist thought, his intolerable Ren Zhen thought officialdom dark.
sentences.chinese: 从道家思想上看，他的任真思想无法忍受官场的黑暗。

sentences.english: The concept of modern Sub conciousness must be applied for studying the mind philosophy of Taosim.
sentences.chinese: 深入研究道家精神哲学，必须引入现代潜意识概念。

sentences.english: Shen Congwen's fictions of "Xiangxi" (the west part of Hunan Province) of subject matters are saturated with the spirit of Daoist art.
sentences.chinese: 沈从文的湘西题材小说浸透了道家艺术精神。

sentences.english: But there is still a difference among them between the rationalists and sentimentalists.
sentences.chinese: 但是新道家之中仍有主理派与主情派的区别。

sentences.english: For example, the Mao Shan Daoist Life Nourishing Company is currently enjoying a test run.
sentences.chinese: 目前已有茅山道家养生有限公司，正在试验经营。

sentences.english: In the development of Mingmen theory, the Taoism regimen contributed more Mingmen theory is a combined thing by the Taoism regimen and medical practising.
sentences.chinese: 命门学说是道家养生理论与医学实践逐步结合的产物。

sentences.english: Great concern about life is the main value of Taoists .
sentences.chinese: 关注生命是道家与道教的基本价值取向。

sentences.english: Accordingly, in culture and ideology are vigorously promoted science of Taoism Taoism.
sentences.chinese: 与此相应，在文化思想上则大力提倡道家黄老之学。

sentences.english: Penglai, a town on the north of the Shandong peninsula famed in Taoism.
sentences.chinese: 蓬莱，有名的道家仙地，位于山东半岛北部。

sentences.english: We can say, it is the thought and the behavior of the recluses that breeds the taoist school.
sentences.chinese: 可以说，隐者群落的思想和行为孕育了道家学派。

definition: Confucian school, founded by Confucius 孔子[Kong3 zi3] (551-479 BC) and Mencius 孟子[Meng4 zi3] (c. 372-c. 289 BC)
Confucian study of ethics/study of Daoism/school for Daoism in Tang and Song times/Daoist magic/another name for 理學|理学, rational learning of Song dynasty neo-Confucianism
arts of healing, divination, horoscope etc/supernatural arts (old)
to achieve the Dao/to become an immortal
to grow old with unfailing eyes and ears (idiom)
oneness of heaven and humanity/the theory that man is an integral part of nature
profound theory/philosophical theory of Wei and Jin 玄學|玄学 sect
